name: Be my Robotine
description:
Robots only have half of the heart, the other half belong to their soul mate. When iLulu moves away, Make BO-B take steps of faith to repair the bridge between them and fix their collective heart. But take too much time and BO-B loses his life....

This is something I made in 7 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 with my artist Umar Rauf.
